entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 6 this afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this morning and early this afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light early this morning. Temperature falling to minus 6 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 14 January 2023
